title: KAIHENG 1/2 Inch x 200 Feet Fabric Tape Double Sided, Clear Adhesive Tape No Sew Stitch Witchery Hemming Tape for Wall, Rug, Floor, Clothes, Arts, Fabric, Crafts and Scrapbooking
features: 【High Quality Double Sided Fabric Tape】This double-sided adhesive tape is of very high quality and has a good stickiness. It is a special tape made of oil-based glue. Furthermore, it is durable and surface safe, easy to remove and can be neatly torn by hand.

【High Adhesive Strength】No Sew Hemming Tape is a highly adhesive but thin and translucent double-sided tape ideal for quick hemming of clothing or cloths, without any time needed for ironing. It is also suitable for use in workplaces or craft workshops, without the need to nail large head nails to the wall or corkboard. You make adjustments in seconds and it can be readjusted/repositioned, which is very time saving and efficient！

【Wide Range of Applications】Fabric Tape Double Sided is widely used in our daily life, offices, schools, manual workshops, industry and other fields. Sticky Fabric Tape can be used to stick not only art and handicrafts, but also for attaching trouser hems, skirts or jeans. Finally, clear adhesive tape is also ideal for curtains, carpets, floors, and walls. Clean without leaving a trace.

【Easy to Use】This Stitch witchery hemming tape simply involves cutting or ripping the tape to the desired length before attaching it to the item and pressing it down, stripping off the top layer to expose the adhesive and finally placing another item on top of the adhesive.

【Temperature Resistance】 Fabric fusion tape could withstand temperatures of -30 to 120 degrees, so you don't have to worry about it losing its viscosity easily; And it is very suitable for temporary pasting and re-use of fixed textiles.
description: Product Description High bonding strength Seamless hemming tape is a high-adhesion yet thin and translucent double-sided tape, perfect for quickly hemming clothes or fabrics without any ironing time. No Ironing Required The quick and easy way- simply peel off the protective backing and press it tightly onto the fabric without sewing, gluing or ironing. Great Fabric Helper This no sewing tape is great for hemming rags, clothing, pillowcases, double-backed tapes, curtains, rugs, arts and crafts, handicrafts and DIY projects. Good Temperature Adaptability The fabric tape can withstand temperatures from -30 to 120 degrees, so you don't have to worry about it losing its adhesive easily. Wide Range of Applications Sticky Fabric Tape can be used to stick not only art and handicrafts, but also for attaching trouser hems, skirts or jeans. Sticky Fabric Tape can be used to stick not only art and handicrafts, but also for attaching trouser hems, skirts or jeans.
